txt.en: Find the herald inside the city gate of Minas Tirith <rgb=#00FF00>(1450 Soldiers Pledged to Aragorn)</rgb>
Find the herald inside the city gate of Minas Tirith <rgb=#00FF00>(1698 Soldiers Pledged to Aragorn)</rgb>
'King Elessar will have the men he needs!'
Read aloud Aragorn's call for soldiers <rgb=#00FF00>(1802 Soldiers Pledged to Aragorn)</rgb>
Find the herald north of the city gate, in the First Circle <rgb=#00FF00>(1978 Soldiers Pledged to Aragorn)</rgb>

There is a herald on the Pelennor Fields north-west of Aragorn's Pavilion.\n\nAragorn sent you to read his call for more soldiers to heralds who can reach the ears of the men that have now arrived at the city.

'So it is decided, for better or ill. The men I sent marching through Lossarnach from Pelargir have drawn nigh the city; so too have the men I commanded to follow the Corsair ships in smaller watercraft up the Anduin. They loiter now, waiting for orders. Let us give them direction, and hope that they make good of their word when they find that direction is \qeast, toward the shadow.\q\n\n'Take this call for soldiers, and read it to heralds on the field and thï¿½
